description.#cdata-section: There is a station closure at Lake Merritt.
There is a station closure at Fruitvale due to a major medical emergency.

sms_text.#cdata-section: Stn closure at FTVL due to a major medical emergency.

description.#cdata-section: There is a major delay on the Berryessa Line in the Dublin / Pleasanton, Berryessa, Richmond and Daly City directions due to a major medical emergency. There is no BART train service between West Oakland, 12th street, and Coliseum stations. A/C transit bus service is available bus numbers 73, 1T and 62.

sms_text.#cdata-section: Major delay on berryessa line in DUBL, berryessa, RICH and DALY dirs due to a major medical emergency. No BART train svc between WOAK, 12th st, and COLS stns. A/c transit bus svc is available bus numbers 73, 1t and 62.
